project_info_title: Boutique design residences on Dubai Islands
project_info_text:
Villa del Arte is an 11-storey boutique residential project on Dubai Islands (Deira) by Mr Eight Development, created in strategic partnership with British design icon Tom Dixon.

The development features a limited collection of residences, including 1–4 bedroom apartments and duplexes. Interiors emphasize premium natural materials and refined finishes, while the lifestyle concept is built around wellness with curated leisure spaces and resort-style amenities within the Dubai Islands waterfront community.
amenities_title: Infrastructure and landscaping of the residential complex
project_summary_title: Curated island living by the sea
map_text:
Villa del Arte is located on Dubai Islands in Deira, a waterfront district designed around beaches, promenades, marinas, and resort-style infrastructure.

The community is well connected to central Dubai and Dubai International Airport, with quick access to Deira’s landmarks such as the Gold Souk and Spice Souk.
footer_tagline: Boutique design residences on Dubai Islands
